description: Carol cancels a code review with Dave because the feature branch is not ready. Single delete event with calendar context.

events.title: Code Review
events.reasoning: Carol explicitly states she needs to cancel the code review scheduled for tomorrow afternoon at 2 PM because the feature branch is not ready. Dave confirms. Matches calendar event [1].

mock_llm_response.summary: Cancelled the code review scheduled for tomorrow at 2 PM.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'tomorrow afternoon' resolves to Saturday 2026-02-21. The transcript says 'the 2 PM one' confirming the time.
